prickly.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if your skin feels prickly, it stings slightly
prickly.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: His skin felt painful and prickly.
The base of my neck was prickly with sweat.
prickly.translation[0].definitions[2].de: something that is prickly makes your skin sting slightly
prickly.translation[0].definitions[3].de: someone who is prickly gets annoyed or offended easily
prickly.translation[0].definitions[3].ex: She was prickly and sharp with me.
As she got older, she became more prickly and forgetful.
prickly.translation[0].definitions[4].de: a prickly subject causes a lot of disagreements and difficulties
prickly.translation[0].definitions[4].ex: We finally turned to the prickly question of who was going to pay.
